reviewText: This is a video I watched as a kid and now my daughter can enjoy it!! Pretty good condition also

My children grew up watching, singing, and dancing to this video 20 years ago.  I got it for my granddaughter at Christmas and it continues to bring back sweet memories when my children were engrossed with the video.

Kids will enjoy watching and dance to the imaginative Camp Melody Group.  Songs includes,"E-magination,She'll Be Coming around the Mountain,Kookaburra,Sammy says,Railroad songs(I been working on railroad,wheels on the train,down by the station),Talk to the Animals,Oh-Susannah,Home on the Range) Appearances includes  Clarissa,and Raccoon Conductor
